name: Settler
uniques: Founds a new city <by consuming this unit>
Excess Food converted to Production when under construction
Limited to [1] per Civilization <for [Lesser School] Civilizations> <hidden from users>

name: Field Captain
uniques: Comment [Experienced field officer leading troops with inspiring and fearsome aura.]
[-25]% Strength for enemy [{Wounded} {Infantry}] units in adjacent [All] tiles
[+15]% Strength bonus for [Infantry] units within [2] tiles
Unavailable <when number of [HQ limit] is less than [1]> <hidden from users>

name: Combat Engineer
uniques: Comment [Infantry unit that can safely move over traps, mines and obstacles, as well as to plant and remove them. Can create Foundations to then place Fortifications there.]
Can build [Defensive Improvement] improvements on tiles
Unavailable <when number of [E limit] is less than [1]> <hidden from users>

name: Field Surgeon
uniques: Comment [Like an angel of salvation, this person comes to give wounded their remedy.]
All adjacent units heal [25] HP when healing
[+15]% Strength bonus for [{Wounded} {Infantry}] units within [1] tiles
Unavailable <when number of [HQ limit] is less than [1]> <hidden from users>

uniques: Comment [Grenade-focused infantry unit with reduced cooldown.]
